LanguageData.WoodLog.label: wood log
LanguageData.WoodLog.description: Wood from trees or other fibrous plants. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch. It can be processed into planks or kindling.
LanguageData.RedWoodLog.label: redwood
LanguageData.RedWoodLog.description: Wood from redwood and sequoia trees or other fibrous plants. Red, valuable and more fireproof than regular wood. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
LanguageData.WoodPlank.label: wood plank
LanguageData.WoodPlank.description: Wood planks crafted from wood logs. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics.
LanguageData.Bamboo.label: bamboo log
LanguageData.Bamboo.description: Bamboo Logs are a type of wood-like grass. It is a fast growing wood alternative that is useful for construction.
LanguageData.BambooPlank.label: bamboo plank
LanguageData.BambooPlank.description: Bamboo Planks are crafted from Bamboo Logs. They are useful for building structures, weapons and even simple prosthetics.
LanguageData.RedWoodPlank.label: redwood plank
LanguageData.RedWoodPlank.description: Redwood planks crafted from redwood logs. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics.
LanguageData.Kindling.label: firewood
LanguageData.Kindling.description: Firewood is either created by cutting logs, or salvaged from breaking down bushes. It can act as a fuel for various low-tech buildings, including the steam generator. It burns twice as long compared to unprocessed wood.
